description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension (incorporating juliet balconies) and alteration to the roof pitch and ridge height with installation of one rooflight to the front roofslope
decision_conditions: The proposed extensions and alterations are considered not to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B.1 (b) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

If you have evidence to contradict the local planning authority's assessment of the application, you are encouraged to apply for the development again and include that evidence in support of the application.

Due to a system error any documents that may have been submitted via the web site are now irretrievable. We would be grateful if you could submit any documents again via email. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience.
